BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Disabilities and Addiction
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Hospitals

Items.Title: Oversight - Access to Mental Health Services in New York City Hospitals.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Access to Mental Health Services in New York City Hospitals.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Hospitals

A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to removing outdated clinical language, and to repeal paragraph 2 of subdivision a of section 555 of such charter in relation to a report on the establishment of the department of health and mental hygiene
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Removing outdated clinical language, and to repeal paragraph 2 of subdivision a of section 555 of such charter in relation to a report on the establishment of the department of health and mental hygiene.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Rivera, Moya, Reynoso, Eugene and Maisel

Items.Title: Oversight - Access to Mental Health Services in New York City Hospitals.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Access to Mental Health Services in New York City Hospitals.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to removing outdated clinical language, and to repeal paragraph 2 of subdivision a of section 555 of such charter in relation to a report on the establishment of the department of health and mental hygiene
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Removing outdated clinical language, and to repeal paragraph 2 of subdivision a of section 555 of such charter in relation to a report on the establishment of the department of health and mental hygiene.
